document_data.name: Tamah
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tamah''' was a woman who lived on the [[Sword Coast]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I remember fighting some gnolls and... and one turned to stone right before my eyes! I turned around and there was this lizard-thing... and then...|Tamah, upon being restored to her normal self.}}
document_data.Possessions: She owned a lakeside cottage found on the [[Trade Way]], just south of [[Beregost]].
document_data.History:
At some point in her life, Tamah ventured northeast of her home and got into a fight with some [[gnoll]]s. Before she could react, Tamah was ''[[petrified]]'' by a [[basilisk]], presumably one that was controlled by the madman [[Mutamin]].

She remained a statue in [[Mutamin's Garden]] until at least the {{YearlinkName|1368}}. By that time her house was all but ruined, as it had sunk down into the lake.
